EmailTemplate.subject: Article: Is India’s “Rush to Cash” Ending?
EmailTemplate.textOnly: The number of digital payments in India hit 2.2 billion in October.1 But India is a cash economy. And the pandemic has made cash even more important, as families raced to reserve cash amid the uncertainty: - Indians held a record Rs26.74 lakh crore as of November 2020 1 - From March to October 2020, the cash in circulation grew 10% 2 But India’s digital and physical worlds are converging. The question is: what impact will that have on cash moving forward?
